channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek After Dark #19 – Apple TV, Monetization, CoronaCon, Stripe Plugin

item.title: By: Christian
item.dc:creator: Christian
item.description: Regarding the stripe plugin. I thought you are not supposed to put your secret key in the client side.
item.content:encoded: Regarding the stripe plugin. I thought you are not supposed to put your secret key in the client side.

item.title: By: Jason Schroeder
item.dc:creator: Jason Schroeder
item.description: @Damir: thanks for your kind comment! (This is Jason who is developing the Stripe plugin.) I personally am not developing a PayPal plugin at this time, but I know that Danny Glover had one a few years ago that was only for Enterprise users (it pre-dated the plugin marketplace). Danny's back on the CoronaLabs payroll, so maybe he'll revisit that code in the future. :)
item.content:encoded: @Damir: thanks for your kind comment! (This is Jason who is developing the Stripe plugin.) I personally am not developing a PayPal plugin at this time, but I know that Danny Glover had one a few years ago that was only for Enterprise users (it pre-dated the plugin marketplace). Danny’s back on the CoronaLabs payroll, so maybe he’ll revisit that code in the future. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Damir Kranjcec
item.dc:creator: Damir Kranjcec
item.description:
Great to see the Stripe plugin is in development. Unfortunately, Stripe is not available in many countries.
Any plans to make a PayPal plugin?
item.content:encoded:
Great to see the Stripe plugin is in development.
Unfortunately, Stripe is not available in many countries.

Any plans to make a PayPal plugin?

item.title: By: Ed
item.dc:creator: Ed
item.description:
Watching the video... at min 46, when you talk about an app where people can only watch ads, have you checked the Video Reward by Perk? It looks similar to your idea (I've not tried the app however)
http://perk.com/perkstatic/home
item.content:encoded:
